department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Regular maintenance and repairs on large vehicles
description: It is the backdrop for many sophomore stories. This request for Standing Offer is for the service, inspection, recovery and repairs to the 3 Ton and heavier trucks & trailers under the direct responsibility of Garrison Petawawa. It is requested this SOA run for 36 consecutive ...
duration_in_months: We would like the Standing Offer Contract to be in place for 36 months...
